events.body: Where does one set the "config resolution strategy"?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -4,7 +4,8 @@ set -eux
 
 export LC_ALL=C
 
-# Print relevant CI environment to allow reproducing the job outside of CI.
+# Print commit and relevant CI environment to allow reproducing the job outside of CI.
+git show --no-patch
comments.body: It would be nice to have a similar command in the native Windows task as well.
